Welcome to the Bloop Museum

Bloop is a retro-tech and gaming museum located near Monroeville, PA. We've been preserving and showcasing vintage electronics, video games, and computer history for over 17 years.

Come visit, donate, or schedule a tour â€” and experience the joy of blinking lights and floppy disks.
